about_the_game:
The galaxy, your home, has been enslaved by the Coalition of Darkness. Those who opposed them were either destroyed or exiled. But your spirit remains unbroken — you are ready to challenge the invaders.
A pantheon of enemies is sending armadas of battle spaceships against you, aiming to annihilate the last resistance in the Eclipse Galaxy. You are the final line of defense against the countless forces of the Conglomerate of Destruction!

BULLET HELL WITH RESOURCE GATHERING


Destroy enemies, upgrade your weapons and spacecraft as you venture deeper into the galaxy's spiral, aiming to reach the enemy command ship. Collect powerful technologies and arsenal to wreak havoc on the enemy fleet in a dynamic and intense battle for the galaxy's freedom.

Game Features:
  • Extract resources and continuously improve your ship with new weapons, special skills and other technologies that affect your performance characteristics.
  • Collect artifacts and get various bonuses and buffs, from long-term repairs to chain explosions.
  • Accumulate experience and research new types of weapons, abilities and ships;
  • Collect metal, craft components and use them to discover permanent improvements and unique abilities: from improving wrap-dashes to increasing your fire density.
  • 6 difficulty levels, each of which not only makes enemies stronger, but also adds new ones, hordes and elite waves

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Later
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or similar
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This is a single-player survivor-like auto-shooter. Fight against fleets of spacecraft, gather resources, research technologies, unlock upgrades, and create devastating builds using modern arsenal.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian
